high_descs: Turn to the left to face the dresser.
Pick up the disc from the right side of the dresser.
Hold the disc and take a step left.
Hold the disc and turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp while holding a disc.

high_descs: Turn left to face the dresser.
Pick up the CD that is sitting on the dresser.
Move to face the lamp sitting on the dresser.
Turn on the lamp sitting on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Look at a CD under a lit lamp.

high_descs: Turn left to face the drawer cabinet.
Grab the CD on the drawer cabinet.
Turn left, walk straight and make a quick right to face the lamp on the drawer cabinet.
anns.task_desc: Grab a CD and turn on the lamp.
